recipesJson.name: Wild Thang!
recipesJson.author: BRDZ
recipesJson.description:
NOTE *INW WILD STRAWBERRY = WILD NATURAL STRAWBERRY SSA/ SUPER AROMA

Super Aroma's Wild strawberry i find to be punchy and sweet, it blends really well with VT Glazed and INW Shisha. FA Custard prem. Brings the custard notes and richness with added WF VCE adds more creaminess to the custard. FLV Vanilla marshmallow adds a little more body and mothfeel to the vape.

An excellent sweet strawberry triffle dessert
